mapper.select: SELECT `name`,shortName,companyEvaluation.`code`,score FROM `companyEvaluation` left join companyBasicInfo on companyBasicInfo.`code`=companyEvaluation.`code` ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT `name`,companyEvaluation.`code` FROM `companyEvaluation` left join companyBasicInfo on companyBasicInfo.`code`=companyEvaluation.`code` where companyEvaluation.code = #{code}
SELECT `name`,shortName,companyEvaluation.`code`,score FROM `companyEvaluation` left join companyBasicInfo on companyBasicInfo.`code`=companyEvaluation.`code` ORDER BY score ASC
SELECT `name`,shortName,companyEvaluation.`code`,score FROM `companyEvaluation` left join companyBasicInfo on companyBasicInfo.`code`=companyEvaluation.`code` where area =#{area} ORDER BY score DESC

SELECT `name`,shortName,companyEvaluation.`code`,score FROM `companyEvaluation` left join companyBasicInfo on companyBasicInfo.`code`=companyEvaluation.`code` where industry =#{industry} ORDER BY score DESC
